title: Stellarmart - Ecommerce Website
description: A full-fledged full-stack e-commerce application with integrated online payment functionality, enabling users to search, save, filter, and purchase products. Users can also manage their profiles and track their orders and purchases. Additionally, implement an admin dashboard to add and track overall products and product sales on the website and manage orders and users.

title: Joblane - Job-Portal Website
description: A full-stack job application portal that enables users to search, save, and filter jobs by category. Users can upload their resumes, manage their profiles, and track the status of applied jobs. The platform includes an admin feature for managing job application statuses and user accounts, as well as posting new job listings on the website.

title: BlogWiz - Blogging Platform
description: A blogging platform website with a sleek and user-friendly interface, allowing users to write articles, upload pictures, edit their articles, delete them as needed, and search through different blogs of other users. The platform includes authentication, login, and registration features.

title: 7up-7down Game
description: The 7up-7down game is a full-stack application with an interactive UI and realistic dice rolls. Users start with 5000 points, which adjust based on wins or losses. Features include profile management, points tracking, game history, and an dashboard for managing and tracking activity, providing an immersive gaming experience .

title: Expense Tracker Application
description: A full-stack expense tracker application with a beautiful and user-friendly interface. Users can add their expenses along with dates and income, and manage their overall income, outgoing, and incoming transactions. The platform enables users to search through their different expenses and includes login and registration functionalities.

title: DoitHero - Todos list
description: A full-stack todo list web application with a beautiful and user-friendly interface, including notification features. Users can add, edit, and delete their todos effortlessly. The platform also includes login and registration functionality for user authentication.

title: Weather Application
description: A weather application that provides weather-related data for any city in the world in Celsius and Fahrenheit. It utilizes the OpenWeather API to fetch weather information for cities and dynamically changes the background image according to the weather conditions. The application boasts a beautiful interface for an enhanced user experience.

title: VibeChat - Live-Chat Application
description: A real-time chat web application built with Socket.IO and Node.js, allowing users to enter chat rooms and engage in live conversations. Multiple users can chat together in the same chat room simultaneously, providing a seamless real-time chatting experience.
